name: Saragna – Social Stream WordPress
author: saragna

sections.description:
The Social Stream plugin lets you retrieve posts/videos/images from different social networks in a grid format from the newest to the oldest.

Usage and Settings

Key Features

  • Get posts/videos/images from differents accounts in the same social network
  • Twitter, Facebook Page, Youtube, Instagram, Vimeo
  • Retrieve Youtube video using username,channel and playlist id.
  • Retrieve tweets using a hashtag.
  • Limit the number of Feeds to retrieve.
  • 1 template layouts.
  • Cross Browser Support.
  • CSS3 transitions and animations
  • User-friendly admin
  • Smart caching

Check Free Version Demo Here for only One layout. Check out Live demo For Free Version

PRO version features

  • Responsive Layout option.
  • Create Multuple Feed
  • 7 Template Layouts
  • Timeline Layout
  • Content Popup
  • Facebook, YouTube, Vimeo, Twitter, Instagram Feed
  • Retrieve Youtube video using Username,Channel and Playlist id.
  • Retrieve tweets using a Username and Hashtag.
  • Social Carousel
  • 5 to 1 Columns Support
  • Social Filter
  • Loading more posts to grid via AJAX
  • Custom backgrond Color and hover background color
  • Show more functionality
  • Mix Feed Available.
  • Sort by Date.
  • Translate ready
  • Well documented

Upgrade to PRO! PRO Version
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working

Automatic installation

To do an automatic install of saragna-social-stream, log in to your WordPress dashboard, navigate to the Plugins menu and click Add New.

In the search field type “saragna-social-stream” and click Search Plugins. Once you have found it you can install it by simply clicking “Install Now”.

Manual installation

Uploading via WordPress Dashboard

  1. Download saragna-social-stream.zip
  2. Navigate to the ‘Add New’ in the plugins dashboard
  3. Navigate to the ‘Upload’ area
  4. Select saragna-social-stream.zip from your computer
  5. Click ‘Install Now’
  6. Activate the plugin in the Plugin dashboard

Using FTP

  1. Download saragna-social-stream.zip
  2. Extract the saragna-social-stream directory to your computer
  3. Upload the saragna-social-stream directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  4. Activate the plugin in the Plugin dashboard

The WordPress codex contains instructions on how to install a WordPress plugin.
sections.faq:
Where I can find Setting?

  1. First Manage your settings in ‘Social Stream >> Social Setting’
  2. add your social stream account in ‘Social Stream >> General Shortcode’
